# ExitTest.Condition

**Structure**

The possible conditions under which an exit test will complete.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Condition
```

## Overview

Values of this type are used to describe the conditions under which an exit test is expected to pass or fail by passing them to [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/expect(processExitsWith:observing:_:sourceLocation:performing:)] or [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/require(processExitsWith:observing:_:sourceLocation:performing:)].

## Successful exit conditions

- **success**: A condition that matches when a process exits normally.

## Failing exit conditions

- **failure**: A condition that matches when a process exits abnormally
- **exitCode(_:)**: Creates a condition that matches when a process terminates with a given exit code.
- **signal(_:)**: Creates a condition that matches when a process exits with a given signal.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Initialize an instance of this type that matches the specified exit status.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
